text:
My
               
              lord
              ,
               
              your
               
              brother
               
              John
               
              is
               
              ta’en
               
              in
               
              flight
              ,

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
And
               
              brought
               
              with
               
              armed
               
              men
               
              back
               
              to
               
              Messina
              .

speaker: BENEDICK
text:
Think
               
              not
               
              on
               
              him
               
              till
               
              tomorrow
              .
              
              I’ll
               
              devise
               
              thee
               
              brave
               
              punishments
               
              for
               
              him
              .
              —
              Strike
              
              up
              ,
               
              pipers
              !
